content: The Act is titled the "Securing Opioids and Unused Narcotics with Deliberate Disposal and Packaging Act of 2018" or the "SOUND Disposal and Packaging Act." It introduces safety-enhancing packaging and disposal features for certain drugs. The Secretary may issue an order requiring the holder of a covered application to implement technologies for drug packaging and disposal to mitigate abuse or misuse, after consulting with stakeholders.
